<strong>JBN 2025 / JBN 2026</strong> - S: JBN 2025 / JBN 2026 - Standard weight classes according to JBN
<strong>Judoka's importeren</strong> - C: Import judokas - Upload CSV or via Coach Portal
<strong>Kruisfinale</strong> - Finale po: Cross Final - Final pool with all advanced judokas

<strong>Wedstrijdsysteem</strong> - Poul: Match system - Pools, Pennant Tournament, Cross Final or Elimination

JudoToernooi (Havun) respecteert uw priv: JudoTournament (Havun) respects your privacy and is committed to protecting personal data. This privacy policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and what rights you have.
JudoToernooi biedt de volgende diensten: JudoTournament offers the following services to organizers:
JudoToernooi gebruikt <strong>GEEN</stro: JudoTournament does NOT use third-party tracking cookies such as Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, or other advertising networks. Your browsing behavior is not shared with advertisers.
JudoToernooi is <strong>niet aansprakeli: JudoTournament is not liable for data loss, regardless of the cause.
JudoToernooi is een online platform waar: JudoToernooi is an online platform that enables judo clubs to organize their tournaments professionally. From registration and weigh-in to pool division and live results - everything in one system.
JudoToernooi is een SaaS-platform van Ha: JudoTournament is a SaaS platform provided by Havun, allowing judo schools and organizers to manage their tournaments.
JudoToernooi wordt aangeboden \"zoals he: JudoTournament is provided "as is", without any warranty of completeness, accuracy, availability, or fitness for a particular purpose. Use of the services is entirely at your own risk.
JudoToernooi wordt zo betrouwbaar mogeli: JudoTournament is provided as reliably as possible. We offer maximum support to organizers during preparation and on match days. However, no guarantee can be given for 100% availability or uptime. In cases of force majeure (power outage, internet failure, server outage), we cannot be held liable for interruptions.
Kaart niet geactiveerd of geen foto: Card not activated or no photo
Kaart wordt gekoppeld aan dit device: Card is linked to this device
Kies een sjabloon of voeg secties toe: Choose a template or add sections
Kies een startpunt en pas categorieën aa: Choose a starting point and adjust categories.
Kies eliminatie als wedstrijdsysteem bij: Choose elimination as match system in Edit Tournament > Categories
Kies het type eliminatie bracket voor ge: Choose the elimination bracket type for weight classes with "Direct elimination"
Kies uw instellingen: gewichtsklassen, w: Choose your settings: weight classes, match system, number of mats. Use a template or start from scratch.
Klik <strong>Einde Voorbereiding</strong: Click End Preparation when the mat distribution is final
Klik <strong>Poule Klaar</strong> - poul: Click Pool Complete - pool goes to speaker for award ceremony.
Klik om een blok toe te voegen aan de fo: Click to add a block to the footer
Klik om een blok toe te voegen aan de he: Click to add a block to the header
Klik op 2 aangrenzende cellen om samen t: Click on 2 adjacent cells to merge
Klik op een blok links om toe te voegen: Click a block on the left to add
Klik op pin-icoon om categorie vast te z: Click pin icon to pin a category
Klik op WiFi icoon → bekijk eigenschappe: Click WiFi icon → view properties → "IPv4 address"
Kom hier terug nadat alle wedstrijden zi: Come back here after all matches have been played to finalize the tournament.
Koppel je eigen <strong>Mollie account</: Link your own Mollie account in Tournament Edit. Payments go directly to your account.
Koppel je Mollie account om betalingen t: Link your Mollie account to receive payments
Korte omschrijving van dit type toernooi: Short description of this tournament type
KvK-nummer en BTW-nummer (bij KYC-verifi: Chamber of Commerce (KvK) number and VAT number (for KYC verification)
Laat :naam deze QR scannen voor de weegk: Have :naam scan this QR for the weigh-in card
Link werkt niet? Kopieer deze URL:: Link not working? Copy this URL:
Live uitslagen en poule-indelingen voor: Live results and pool draws for :naam on :datum
Live wedstrijdschema op telefoon, tablet: Live match schedule on phone, tablet and screen
Log in op uw club portaal om de gegevens: Log in to your club portal to adjust the data:
Lokaal netwerk vs Internet - wat is het: Local network vs Internet - what's the difference?
Maak gratis een account aan en ontdek ho: Create a free account and discover how easy it can be.
Maak toegangen aan voor vrijwilligers. E: Create access for volunteers. Each access has a unique URL and PIN.
Mat-interface voor juryleden. Ouders kun: Mat interface for referees. Parents can watch live when their child is up.
Maximaal leeftijdsverschil binnen één po: Maximum age difference within one pool. E.g. v.age = 1: an 8-year-old and 9-year-old may be in the same pool, but not an 8-year-old and 10-year-old.
Medailles toekennen door winnaar/verliez: Assign medals by dragging winner/loser to medal slots
Meer judoka's nodig? Upgrade naar een ho: Need more judokas? Upgrade to a higher package:
Meer wedstrijden, iedereen minimaal 2x j: More matches, everyone fights at least twice.
Melding: klik op een gekleurde wedstrijd: Message: click a colored match to deselect
Na activatie is deze kaart gekoppeld aan: After activation, this card is linked to this device and your photo.
Na afloop van het toernooi kun je hier a: After the tournament you can finalize everything here and get a complete overview of the results.
After the tournament you can finalize everything here. You get an overview of all results, statistics and club rankings.
Na afronding voorrondes selecteert het s: After completing the preliminary rounds, the system automatically selects the advancing judokas
Na blokverdeling klikt u <strong>Naar Za: After block distribution, click To Hall Overview. This saves the block distribution and automatically assigns mats.
Na configureren kun je de instellingen o: After configuring, you can save the settings as a custom preset for later use.
Na de poule-indeling ontvangt u in uw co: After the pool division you will receive the weigh cards in your coach portal for all your judokas. You can easily forward them via WhatsApp or email to the parents/judokas.
Na sluiten weegtijd kunnen judoka's buit: After weigh-in time closes, judokas may fall outside their weight class or be absent.
Na validatie kunnen coaches geen wijzigi: After validation, coaches can no longer make changes
Na wijzigingen: opnieuw \"Maak weegkaart: After changes: click "Create weigh-in cards" again
Naam, e-mailadres en organisatienaam (bi: Name, email address, and organization name (upon registration)
Naleving van JBN-reglementen en eigen to: Compliance with JBN regulations and specific tournament rules
Namens :organisatie nodigen wij uw club: On behalf of :organisatie we invite your club to participate in :toernooi.
Neem contact op via <a href=\"mailto:hav: Please contact us at havun22@gmail.com. We will respond within 30 days.
Niet alle wedstrijden zijn voltooid. Slu: Not all matches are completed. Only close the tournament when all matches have been played.
Do not share with third parties.
Niet gewogen na sluiting weegtijd = <str: Not weighed after weigh-in time closes = absent
Niet-gekoppelde CSV kolommen (sleep naar: Unmapped CSV columns (drag to a field above):
Nog geen blokken. Klik hierboven om te b: No blocks yet. Click above to get started.
Nog geen blokken. Maak eerst blokken aan: No blocks yet. Create blocks first in tournament settings.
Nog geen poules. Genereer eerst de poule: No pools yet. Generate the pool layout first.
Nog geen templates. Sla instellingen op: No templates yet. Save settings from an existing tournament.
Noodknop: Reset Blok naar Eind Voorberei: Emergency button: Reset Block to End of Preparation
Noodpakket & backups — uw toernooi stopt: Emergency package & backups — your tournament never stops
Noodplan backup voor offline werken: Emergency plan backup for offline use
Officieel systeem: alleen verliezers van: Official system: only losers from quarterfinals
om de poules eerst aan matten toe te wij: to assign pools to mats first. They will then appear in the hall overview.
Onbeschikbaarheid van de dienst door ond: Unavailability of the service due to maintenance or technical issues
Onderbreking van het toernooi door techn: Interruption of the tournament due to technical problems
Online betalingen zijn alleen zinvol als: Online payments only make sense if the portal is set to "Full" (new registrations).
Ontworpen door judoka\\u0027s, voor judo: Designed by judokas, for judokas. Every feature is tested at real tournaments.
Onvolledige judoka's kunnen niet :actie: Incomplete judokas cannot be :actie. Fill in the missing data.
Op de <strong>Poules</strong> pagina kun: On the Pools page you can change the system per pool via the dropdown (e.g. elimination → pools with too few participants).
Op de <strong>Poules</strong> pagina ste: On the Pools page you configure per cross final how many places advance (1 or 2)
On the Pools page you configure per cross final how many places advance:
Op deze algemene voorwaarden is Nederlan: Dutch law applies to these terms and conditions. Disputes will be submitted to the competent court in the Netherlands.
Open op elke tablet de browser en ga naa: Open the browser on each tablet and go to:
Openbare pagina voor ouders en toeschouw: Public page for parents and spectators. Installable as PWA on phone.
Opent URL, voert PIN in, device wordt ge: Opens URL, enters PIN, device is bound
Oplossing: sleep judoka naar andere poul: Solution: drag judoka to another pool, or at weigh-in weight
Opties: wacht tot alle judoka's gewogen: Options: wait until all judokas are weighed, or turn off "Weigh-in required" in the tournament settings.
Organisator kan ook CSV/Excel uploaden v: Organizer can also upload CSV/Excel via Judokas > Import.
Organisatoren kunnen een betaald abonnem: Organizers can subscribe to a paid plan for extended features. Payments are processed via Mollie (iDEAL, credit card, Bancontact).
Organisatoren kunnen via het platform in: Organizers can collect registration fees from participating clubs through the platform. This can be done via the organizer's own Mollie account (Connect mode) or via the JudoTournament platform (Platform mode).
Organiseer teamtoernooien en wimpelcompe: Organize team tournaments and pennant competitions. Club scores are calculated automatically. Perfect for regional competitions.
Organiseer uw judotoernooi professioneel: Organize your judo tournament professionally with JudoToernooi. From registration to final standings, everything in one platform.
Oude geprinte weegkaarten zijn dan ONGEL: Old printed weigh-in cards will be INVALID
Ouders en coaches volgen live mee — geen: Parents and coaches follow live — no more questions from the sideline
Ouders zien real-time wanneer hun kind v: Parents see in real-time when their child fights
Overzicht van alle klanten (organisatore: Overview of all customers (organizers) and their tournaments
Overzicht van alle verstuurde emails voo: Overview of all sent emails for
Overzichtelijke mat-interface met kleurc: Clear mat interface with color codes. Referees see immediately who is up next. Parents can watch live.
Pas daarna zijn weegkaarten beschikbaar: Only then are weigh-in cards available with the correct block and mat info
Pas de categorie-instellingen aan voorda: Adjust the category settings before generating pools.
Per categorie kun je kiezen uit vier wed: Per category you can choose from four match systems:
Per club wordt automatisch een URL + PIN: A URL + PIN is automatically created per club
Per milestone: puntenaantal + omschrijvi: Per milestone: point threshold + description of the prize
Persoonsgegevens worden verwerkt conform: Personal data is processed in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
Poule :nummer is nog niet doorgestuurd n: Poule :nummer has not been sent to the mat yet.
Poule grootte niet in lijst = problemati: Pool size not in list = problematic (red)
Poule indeling, Digitale weging, Live ui: Pool division, Digital weigh-in, Live results, Elimination brackets, Coach portal, Real-time synchronization
Poule is nu klaar voor activatie in Zaal: Pool is now ready for activation in Hall Overview
Poule wordt oranje gemarkeerd als de gew: Pool is highlighted orange when the weight range is too large
Poule-indeling en wedstrijdschema's gene: Generating pool layouts and competition schedules
Poules met puntentelling over meerdere t: Pools with points tracking across multiple tournaments
Poules met verkeerde grootte of te groot: Pools with wrong size or weight difference too large. Click to go to the pool:
Poules staan nog niet in het zaaloverzic: Pools are not yet in the hall overview
Poules staan nog niet op matten: Pools are not yet assigned to mats
Poules worden samengesteld op basis van: Pools are composed based on actual weight. Within one pool, the weight difference may not exceed this number. E.g. max kg = 3: a pool can contain 28kg, 29kg and 31kg.
Print poule-overzichten per blok/mat vóó: Print pool overviews per block/mat before the tournament starts. Useful for distributing to table officials.
Print weegkaarten, coachkaarten en wedst: Print weigh-in cards, coach cards and match schedules
Problemen met real-time synchronisatie t: Problems with real-time synchronization between devices
Professioneel toernooi management voor j: Professional tournament management for judo clubs. From registration to final standings, everything in one platform.
QR scanner voor toegangscontrole bij de: QR scanner for access control at the entrance of the dojo (competition area).
QR-code is <strong>alleen zichtbaar op h: QR code is only visible on the activated device
QR-code scannen, gewicht invoeren, klaar: Scan QR code, enter weight, done
QR-codes verversen elke 4 minuten ter be: QR codes refresh every 4 minutes for security.
QR-codes voor snelle weging. Real-time o: QR codes for quick weigh-in. Real-time overview of who has been weighed and who still needs to.
Rate limiting op login en API endpoints: Rate limiting on login and API endpoints
Realtime chat tussen hoofdjury en vrijwi: Real-time chat between head referee and volunteers (mats, weigh-in, announcer, dojo).
Reset alle scores (WP en JP) voor deze w: Reset all scores (WP and JP) for this match
Reset doorstuur-status (poules worden we: Reset forward status (pools turn grey again)
Reset een blok naar de status aan het ei: Reset a block to its state at the end of preparation. Useful if something went wrong during match day.
Reset poule :nummer? Wedstrijden worden: Reset poule :nummer? Matches will be deleted.
Reset zaalindeling (zaaloverzicht wordt: Reset hall layout (hall overview becomes empty)
Resultaten verschijnen hier zodra poules: Results will appear here once pools are completed.
Scan de QR-code, voer het gewicht in, kl: Scan the QR code, enter the weight, done. Real-time overview of who has been weighed and who still needs to. No more paper weigh lists.
Scan QR-code op weegkaart: Scan QR code on weigh-in card
Scan QR-code van coachkaart: Scan QR code from coach card
Schade door internet-, server- of softwa: Damage from internet, server, or software problems
Schade ontstaan door internet- of server: Damage resulting from internet or server problems during tournaments
Seeding via drag & drop, alleen in de A-: Seeding via drag & drop, only in the A-bracket and before the 1st match starts
Selecteer welke clubs je wilt uitnodigen: Select which clubs you want to invite for this tournament
Server niet bereikbaar. Je kunt nog stee: Server unreachable. You can still print from the local backup (localStorage).
Serveruitval of trage responstijden: Server outage or slow response times
Sla de huidige toernooi-instellingen op: Save the current tournament settings as a template for future tournaments.
Sleep een kolom-knop naar een andere rij: Drag a column button to another row to swap.
Sleep om de volgorde aan te passen. Eers: Drag to adjust the order. First = most desired, lowest = minimum, highest = maximum.
Sleep om te centreren, knijp/scroll om t: Drag to center, pinch/scroll to zoom
Sleep poules naar andere matten indien n: Drag pools to other mats if needed.
Sleep poules naar een andere mat om te v: Drag poules to another mat to move them
fast during activity, slow during pause.
Sporthal WiFi + mobiele hotspot als back: Sports hall WiFi + mobile hotspot as backup
SSL/TLS versleuteling voor alle datatran: SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmission
Standaard: 0.5 kg. Gebruik 0.3 voor stri: Default: 0.5 kg. Use 0.3 for stricter policy.
Stap 2: Kies je aantal judoka's: Step 2: Choose your number of judokas
Stel de weeg- en starttijden in per blok: Set the weigh-in and start times per block. These times are shown on weigh-in cards.
Stuur de weegkaarten naar je judoka's vi: Send the weigh-in cards to your judokas via WhatsApp or copy the link.
Stuur deze links naar je judoka's zodat: Send these links to your judokas so they can show their weigh-in card at the weigh-in. Each judoka has a unique QR code.
Stuur elke vrijwilliger zijn/haar eigen: Send each volunteer their own link + PIN!
Sync stuurt alleen volledige judoka's do: Sync only sends complete judokas to the organizer. After syncing you can still make changes, but then you need to sync again.
Systeem selecteert automatisch de beste: System automatically selects the best judokas
Tablets blijven op eigen WiFi, alleen br: Tablets stay on own WiFi, only source switches
Tablets blijven op eigen WiFi, geen clou: Tablets stay on own WiFi, no cloud sync
Tablets blijven op sporthal WiFi!: Tablets stay on sports hall WiFi!
Te oud/jong voor dit toernooi. Alleen zi: Too old/young for this tournament. Only visible in the club portal.
Template \":naam\" laden? Dit vervangt j: Load template ":naam"? This will replace your current notes.
Tip: De volgorde is geoptimaliseerd zoda: Tip: The order is optimized so judokas get rest between matches.
Tip: Klik op wedstrijdnummer om te selec: Tip: Click on match number to select. Only enter points for green matches. Click green to skip (yellow advances).
Tip: Noteer deze IP's ook op papier voor: Tip: Write down these IPs on paper for emergencies
Toegangsbewijzen voor begeleiders tot de: Access passes for coaches to the Dojo (1 per :aantal judokas)

URL en PIN ook direct te kopieren voor W: URL and PIN can also be copied directly for WhatsApp
Uw clubs en judoka\\u0027s worden bewaar: Your clubs and judokas are saved between tournaments. No double work: import from your existing administration or reuse previous registrations.
Uw judotoernooi in minuten, niet in weke: Your judo tournament in minutes, not weeks
Valideer na sluiting datum gewichtsmutat: Validate after the weight changes submission deadline:
Van inschrijving tot eindstand: alles wa: From registration to final standings: everything you need in one platform. Automatic pool division, digital weighing, live results and more.

Vastgezette categorieeen blijven staan b: Pinned categories remain in place when recalculating

Verstuur uitnodigingen of correctie verz: Send invitations or correction requests to see them here.
Verwerking van betalingen (platform abon: Processing payments (platform subscriptions and registration fees)

Vul je organisatiegegevens in. Deze word: Fill in your organization details. These will be used for the invoice.
Vul uw e-mailadres in en we sturen u een: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
Waar u vroeger dagen bezig was met Excel: Where you used to spend days with Excel sheets, paper weigh forms and handwritten pools, JudoToernooi handles everything digitally. From registration to medal ceremony.

Weegkaarten tonen aanmaakdatum/tijd om v: Weigh-in cards show creation date/time to distinguish versions

Welcome to JudoTournament (judotournament.org). These terms and conditions apply to the use of our platform. By using JudoTournament, you agree to these terms.
Wij behouden ons het recht voor om deze: We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions. Changes take effect upon publication on this page. We advise you to consult this page regularly.
We reserve the right to modify this disclaimer at any time. The most recent version can always be found on this page.
Wij delen gegevens alleen met de volgend: We only share data with the following parties, solely for the purpose of delivering our services:
Wij doen er alles aan om persoonsgegeven: We make every effort to keep personal data secure. Data is used exclusively for providing our services and will never be sold to third parties.
Wij gebruiken persoonsgegevens <strong>u: We use personal data exclusively for providing our services. Data is never sold, rented, or shared with third parties for commercial purposes.
Wij kunnen deze privacyverklaring aanpas: We may update this privacy policy. The most recent version can always be found on this page.
Wij kunnen dit cookiebeleid bijwerken. D: We may update this cookie policy. The most recent version can always be found on this page.
Wij raden <strong>dringend</strong> aan: We strongly recommend installing a local server on the local network for each tournament as a hot standby. This ensures the tournament can continue in case of internet failure.
Wijs een mat toe aan de kruisfinale in h: Assign a mat to the cross final in the Hall Overview

zodat de weeglijst, weegkaarten en het z: so that the weigh-in list, weigh-in cards and hall overview work correctly.

Voor de eerste wedstrijd (bv. warming-up: Before the first match (e.g. warm-up injury):
Wedstrijddag Poules → judoka op afwezig: Match Day Pools → set judoka as absent
Zaaloverzicht → wedstrijdschema resetten: Hall Overview → reset match schedule (chip back to white)
Witte chip opnieuw klikken → nieuw schem: Click white chip again → new schedule without absent judoka
Als een judoka uitvalt vóór de eerste we: If a judoka drops out before the first match (e.g. warm-up injury):
Zet de judoka op afwezig (hier op Wedstr: Set the judoka as absent (here on Match Day Pools)
Ga naar Zaaloverzicht → reset het wedstr: Go to Hall Overview → reset the match schedule (chip back to white)
Klik de witte chip opnieuw → nieuw schem: Click the white chip again → new schedule without the absent judoka
De poule-indeling (voorbereiding) blijft: The pool assignment (preparation) remains unchanged. Only the match schedule is regenerated.
Klik een wedstrijdnummer → wordt <span c: Click a match number → becomes green (now playing)
Klik het volgende nummer → wordt <span c: Click the next number → becomes yellow (stand by)
Klik nog een nummer → wordt <span class=: Click another number → becomes blue (get ready)
Klik op <span class=\"text-blue-600 font: Click blue → blue turns off
Klik op <span class=\"text-yellow-600 fo: Click yellow → yellow turns off, blue shifts to yellow
Klik op <span class=\"text-green-600 fon: Click green → match cancelled, yellow becomes green, blue becomes yellow
